Class Airport

Airport
public class Airport extends Object
An airport class which stores the information of the airports

  • Method Details

    • makeFlight

      public void makeFlight(String name, String departAirport, String arrivalAirport, String departDate, String arrivalDate, String departTime, String arrivalTime, String terminal, int gate, int totalSeats, int takenSeats, int availableSeats, String cost, String duration, boolean bookStatus)
      Method which add a new flight to the array if the size of the array is less than 5
      Parameters:
      name - Stores the name of the flight
      departAirport - Stores the name of the departure airport of the flight
      arrivalAirport - Stores the name of the arrival airport of the flight
      departDate - Stores the departure date of the flight
      arrivalDate - Stores the arrival date of the flight
      departTime - Stores the departure time of the flight
      arrivalTime - Stores the arrival time of the flight
      terminal - Stores the airport terminal of the flight
      gate - Stores the airport gate of the flight
      totalSeats - Stores the total number of seats in the flight
      takenSeats - Stores the number of already reserved seats in the flight
      availableSeats - Stores the number of availble seats in the flight
      cost - Stores the cost of the flight
      duration - Stores the duration of the flight
      bookStatus - Stores the booking status of the flight
